sentence.Network_en: Whether the Myxomycota are closely related to the Eumycota is doubtful.
sentence.Network_cn: 粘菌是否与真菌有密切的亲缘关系还没有确定.

PerfectNetExp.abs: eumycophyta 真菌门, eumycota 真菌门, eumycota 真菌

means.word_mean: 1. true fungi; eukaryotic heterotrophic walled organisms; distinguished from Myxomycota (funguslike slime molds): comprises subdivisions Mastigomycotina; Zygomycotina; Ascomycotina; Basidiomycotina; Deuteromycotina (imperfect fungi)
